thread.section_title: Munich Ski Shuttle Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Munich Ski Shuttle | www.munich-ski-shuttle.com | 2 von 10
thread.title: Merwen Mellet
thread.title_full: Munich Ski Shuttle bewertet von Merwen Mellet

author: Merwen Mellet
title: Merwen Mellet
text:
If you drive 4 hours with somebody that you do not know at all and the road is full of snow and has a lot of curves and passes you get to know him very quickly.
Our family felt totally relaxed and I was particular impressed by their skllfull driving. Eric is running a great bussiness and I can recommend them very highly.
Regards,
M Mellet
